text: Keisuke no chishiki o motsu mono wa itta. `Watashi wa hitotsu no mabataki no ma ni, anata ni sore o motte mairimashou.'(Suraimān wa) sore ga kare no mae ni oka reta no o mite, itta. `Kore wa watashi no omo no onmegumi. Watashi ga kansha suru ka, matawa onshirazu ka o kokoromi rareru tamedesu. Hontōni kansha suru mono wa, jibun no tame ni kansha suru mo dōzen. Dare ga onshirazudeatte mo watashi no omo wa, michi tara reru kata sūkōna katadesu
